## ğŸ“‹ Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run `pnpm check` (TypeScript type checking)
- [ ] I have run `pnpm format` (code formatting)

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have run `pnpm test` successfully

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated `todo.md` if applicable
- [ ] I have added comments to complex code sections

### Web3 Specific (if applicable)
- [ ] Tested with Solana wallet (Phantom/Solflare)
- [ ] Tested with Ethereum wallet (MetaMask)
- [ ] Verified smart contract interactions
- [ ] Tested on correct network (Devnet/Mainnet)
- [ ] No private keys or secrets committed

### Database (if applicable)
- [ ] Database migrations tested
- [ ] Schema changes documented
- [ ] Data integrity maintained
